author: Special Correspondent
text:
The State government may consider establishing a research centre at Anna University to study the latest discovery of gravitational waves, according to Higher Education Minister P Palaniappan.

He said this in the Assembly in response to a supplementary question on the issue raised by rebel DMDK MLA Ma Foi Pandiarajan during the Question Hour. Meanwhile, Electricity Minister Natham R Viswanathan, to a question on laying of underground electricity cables in Karaikudi, said with World Bank aid it would be undertaken in Cuddalore district and in Velankanni, but in other places there was no proposal.
title: Govt. may consider research centre on gravitational waves
